name: Toy-War: The Beginning
description:
TOY-WAR
a Fantasy first person shooter game!
Wonderful Graphic by The best Engine of the World, The Unreal Engine 4Features
  • Wonderful Graphic
  • Fantasy war
  • Magical World
  • Basic FPS Game Easy To play
  • Unreal Engine 4 Graphic
  • Interesting Story

Storyline
TOY-WAR is war weapon and military equipment
there is microform weapon for actual use.
All types are manufactured using nanotechnology.
TOY-WAR is war weapon and military equipment
there is microform weapon for actual use.
All types are manufactured using nanotechnology.
While the cargo ship is going to Sydney Australia
the TOY-WAR containers is lightweight and it must be place on the top
of the vessel, there is a big storm surge during the way and hit the
TOY-WAR containers into the sea.
The ship must quickly escape this storm.
The TOY-WAR container cannot be recovered but that's okay
with marine insurance and the most of the goods in the ship is agriculture
must be delivering on time to protect the goods.
Later, orangutan found the TOY-WAR containers first and opened it but not found anything they can eat.
So them leave and go away.
Later on the brown ants & white ants found TOY-WAR which is fit for use. They took TOY-WAR used as a war weapon.
This is the Beginning of TOY-WAR.
